data.title: Enterprise Florist. Flower Delivery Enterprise, Utah
data.meta_description: Wow with same-day flower delivery. Stunning bouquets express your feelings instantly. Order now for fast and reliable service!

Julianna

from: $167.00

WE LOVE WHAT WE DO AND IT SHOWS!

Delight loved ones in Enterprise, UT with stunning, freshly crafted floral arrangements. As a family-owned business for 27 years, La Tulipe Flowers takes pride in meticulously arranging and delivering exquisite bouquets throughout Enterprise, Utah. Our same-day delivery service caters to almost any address in the area, allowing you to effortlessly surprise your recipients. Simply place your order online from your computer, tablet, or phone, and we’ll handle the rest. Let us make it effortless for you to send beautiful flowers and plants to nearly any destination.

Susan V.

Annie designed the flowers for my wedding. She is so personable and great to work with during the planning process. Planning a wedding can be stressful and it was nice to get her feedback and advise on setup and design. She kept us on track with the amount we budgeted for flowers. Everything came out amazing! Looking back at our wedding photos it’s clear how the arrangements can really change an event space and make it “you” for your special day.

I would give more stars if I could. Annie put together the perfect floral arrangement for my niece, who is in the hospital. My niece loved them. She sent me a picture and they were beautiful. Annie was a delight to work with and really cared that they got to my niece quickly. If you want a first class florist, La Tulipe is the best.

Met with Annie at La Tulipe to order a casket spray for my Uncle's service. I provided her a picture of what we wanted the arrangements to look like and the flowers we wanted. With all the expenses that had already incurred for the funeral service, we were on a tight budget. Annie was extremely understanding and worked with the budget we gave her, while still ensuring that the flowers we receive will be beautiful. When we arrived at my Uncle's viewing, we were very pleased and happy at how beautiful she made the spray...better than what we had envisioned. I would definitely recommend La Tulipe for any occasion.

Tiffany J.

We chose La Tulipe as it was a preferred vendor from our wedding venue.

The owner, Annie, was very pleasant to work with, was helpful with all our questions/concerns, good with communication, and made our vision come true for our big day. There was also never any pressure on budget, which was very refreshing!

Our centerpieces were included in our package through the venue (part of the reason we went with La Tulipe, as she had worked this venue many times) and they were exactly what we wanted - personally, I had feared they would be/look cheap (since they were "included"), but I was REALLY impressed with how they turned out.

Annie also worked with my now Husband, on two projects, that were surprises - both turned out amazing!

All in all, we were both very happy with La Tulipe, and would recommend to anyone looking for a florist.

read moreread less

Enterprise Flower Delivery

Sending a beautiful flower arrangement to Enterprise, UT

Any Occasion Flower Delivery

Make someone’s day special with our local florist flower delivery service in Enterprise, UT. It’s simple to send beautiful floral arrangements for birthdays, get well wishes, anniversaries, sympathy, funerals, or any occasion you can think of in Enterprise, Utah. In a hurry? We provide same-day deliveries for most bouquets from Monday to Saturday. Just ensure your order is placed by 12:00 PM in the recipient’s time zone, our designers will create and deliver your arrangement promptly.

Funeral Service Flower Delivery

Sending flowers to a funeral service can be a thoughtful and comforting gesture to express sympathy and support to the grieving family. Flower delivery to a funeral service is a common practice to honor and remember the deceased. The beautiful flowers serve as a symbol of love, respect, and remembrance. The presence of flowers at a funeral can provide solace and peace to those in mourning, and they also add a touch of beauty and warmth to the somber atmosphere. Whether it is a traditional wreath, elegant bouquet, or a personalized arrangement, sending flowers is a heartfelt way to pay tribute to the departed and show your condolences to the family during their time of loss.

Hospital Flower Delivery

Hospital flower delivery services provide a way for loved ones to show support and compassion for patients who are undergoing treatment or recovering. Sending flowers to a hospital room can brighten up the atmosphere and bring a sense of joy and comfort to the recipient. Many florists offer same-day delivery to hospitals, ensuring that the flowers arrive in a timely manner. It is important to consider the hospital’s policies on flowers and gifts before placing an order, as some hospitals have restrictions on certain types of flowers or deliveries. Overall, hospital flower delivery is a thoughtful gesture that can make a patient’s day a little brighter during a challenging time.

School & College Flower Delivery

Experience the convenience and dependability of our flower delivery service for schools and colleges in Enterprise, UT. From adding a pop of color to a classroom to sending a lovely floral display to a teacher or student, we offer an extensive array of fresh and sophisticated flowers. Our skilled florists take great care in creating each arrangement, ensuring that it arrives in all its glory. Order with ease through our online platform and have the flowers delivered directly to the school or college. Let La tulipe’s school and college flower delivery service help you leave a lasting impression and express your gratitude.

Assisted/Senior Living Flower Delivery

Assisted living flower delivery services by La Tulipe provide a thoughtful and convenient way for families to send flowers to their loved ones residing in a senior living community. These services cater to the unique needs of seniors, offering a variety of beautiful bouquets and arrangements that can brighten their day and lift their spirits. Whether it’s for a special occasion or just to show someone they are being thought of, the convenience of having flowers delivered directly to their door can bring joy and comfort to seniors who may not have the ability to visit a local florist themselves. With easy online ordering and reliable delivery, we make it easy to show love and support from afar.
